title: Poaching and steaming
creator_contributor_role: KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery
description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Learn the basics of poaching and steaming techniques and cook a variety of foods in this quick light style. Three entrees are featured: "Poached Beef Tenderloin" with a tarragon flavoured "Sabayon Sauce"; make a quick mousse for "Chicken Imperial Ballotine"; or use an Asian-style steamer to create "Chinese Steam Fish" with fragrant lemon grass, ginger and garlic.
related_objects: Series; S01150; Cooking at the Academy; Active; 1991
